cluster_information.name: Microwave Oven Control
cluster_information.description: This cluster defines the requirements for the Microwave Oven Control cluster. This cluster has dependencies with the Operational State and Microwave Oven Mode clusters. The Operational State cluster and the Microwave Oven Mode clusters, or derivatives of those clusters SHALL appear on the same endpoint as this cluster.

PWRNUM.name: PowerAsNumber
PWRNUM.summary: Power is specified as a unitless number or a percentage

PWRLMTS.name: PowerNumberLimits
PWRLMTS.summary: Supports the limit attributes used with the PWRNUM feature

0x0000.name: CookTime
0x0000.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the total cook time associated with the operation of the device. This attribute SHALL remain unchanged during the operation of the oven unless the value is changed via a command or out-of-band action.

0x0001.name: MaxCookTime
0x0001.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the maximum value to which the CookTime attribute can be set.

0x0002.name: PowerSetting
0x0002.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the power level associated with the operation of the device.

0x0003.name: MinPower
0x0003.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the minimum power level that can be set on the server.

0x0004.name: MaxPower
0x0004.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the maximum power level that can be set on the server.

0x0005.name: PowerStep
0x0005.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the increment of power that can be set on the server.

0x0006.name: SupportedWatts
0x0006.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the list of power levels (in W) supported by the server.

0x0007.name: SelectedWattIndex
0x0007.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the index into the list of SupportedWatts of the currently selected power setting.

0x0008.name: WattRating
0x0008.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the rating, in Watts, of the microwave power of the oven. Supporting this attribute can assist clients in suggesting cooking settings for various foods and beverages.

0x00.name: SetCookingParameters

fields.name: CookMode
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the value to which the CurrentMode attribute of the Microwave Oven Mode cluster should be set.

fields.name: CookTime
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the CookTime associated with the operation of the device.

fields.name: PowerSetting
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the PowerSetting associated with the operation of the device.

fields.name: WattSettingIndex
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the value to which the SelectedWattIndex attribute is set.

fields.name: StartAfterSetting
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate whether or not oven operation SHALL be started when the command is received.

0x00.description: This command is used to set the cooking parameters associated with the operation of the device.

0x01.name: AddMoreTime
0x01.description: This command is used to add more time to the cooking operation.

dependencies.description: The Operational State cluster and the Microwave Oven Mode clusters, or derivatives of those clusters SHALL appear on the same endpoint as this cluster.
